greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Number of divisors d>1 of n such that also d+1 divides n.
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
mathematica: Table[DivisorSum[n, 1 &, And[# > 1, Divisible[n, # + 1]] &], {n, 105}] (* _Michael De Vlieger_, Jul 12 2017 *)
program: (PARI) first(n) = my(v = vector(n),k); for(i=2,sqrtint(n),k=i*(i+1); for(j=1, n\k, v[j*k]++); v \\ _David A. Corneth_, Jul 12 2017
results.author: _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Oct 12 2003
